txt.en: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: a green-skinned Orc wearing a cloth tunic and heavy armour on the left shoulder, left arm, and lower legs. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: a green-skinned Orc wearing a cloth tunic and heavy armour on the left shoulder, left arm, and lower legs. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.
